title: Best of The Herd: 12/27/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/27/2018
description:
Doug Gottlieb sits in for Colin Cowherd and explains how the Green Bay Packers are botching their search for Aaron Rodgers' new HC and gives you an analogy you're sure to relate to, tells you why the decision most people think is an easy one for Kyler Murray is actually wrong and tells which young Laker needs to show he can produce while LeBron James is sidelined with a groin injury. Plus, legendary broadcaster and Clippers play-by-play voice Ralph Lawler joins the show to talk about his upcoming retirement and this year's upstart Clippers team.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
